lb:
Reduces [Main Battery] CD by 4 seconds.
Refined Taste upgraded to Level 2.
During [Main Battery Salvo], adds a chance to activate [Cut-in].

Increases [Main Battery Salvo] damage by 20%.
Refined Taste upgraded to Level 3.

When [Secondary Battery] is firing, firing a [Main Battery Salvo] will deal 200% more damage, will assume T-Adv for damage. Can only proc once per battle.
Refined Taste upgraded to Level 4.

skills.name: Class Skill
skills.text:
Can attack from medium range, reload time: 12s
Can launch torpedoes from medium range; another torpedo cannot be fired unless an already launched torpedo has hit the enemy/expired

skills.name:
Bullet Hell
弾幕
skills.text: 1. [On Main Battery Salvo], prioritizes target with the lowest current HP.2. If a ship is sunk during a [Main Battery Salvo] that involves Prinz Eugen, instantly reloads [Main Battery].3. Crit Rate increased by 25% if in Mid range.

skills.name:
Resurgence
逆境
skills.text: 1. [On Main Battery Salvo] if attacking with [T-Disadvantage], 100% to disregard damage debuff.2. If a ship is sunk during a [Main Battery Salvo] that doesn't involve Prinz Eugen, increase damage by 25% until the end of this battle.

skills.name:
Arrogance
傲慢の寛大
skills.text: 1. Reduces incoming damage by 20%.2. When the Fleet is sailing at Full Speed, fatigue buildup is reduced by 50%.

comment: Sweet on the outside, dangerous on the inside. She believes that she and the commander are immortal and they'll be together forever... The combination is too dangerous to involve yourself in.
